projects.title: Job Matching Platform 08/2024
projects.bodyText:
**Description**: Built an AI-powered job matching platform with 92% resume parsing accuracy to detect skill gaps, match real-time job listings, and recommend relevant roles.
* Integrated Gemini AI for smart resume feedback, formatting suggestions, and personalized career guidance

projects.title: Automatic Job Recruitment System 08/2024
projects.bodyText:
**Description**: Developed a multi-agent AI recruitment system that automatically summarizes job descriptions, extracts candidate qualifications from resumes, and calculates match scores for efficient shortlisting.
* Implemented interview scheduling automation and used SQLite for persistent multi-agent memory, streamlining the end-to-end hiring workflow with intelligent decision-making.

projects.title: Autoform Chrome Extension 08/2024
projects.bodyText:
**Description**: Developed a Chrome extension that automates form filling by extracting webpage form structures and matching fields with user data.
* Integrated AI using a Sentence Transformer model to intelligently autofill fields, with support for data persistence, manual review, and secure submission.
